We refer to Wikipedia articles on computer software for help. When the narrator says he will use the Prepare Form option and that he doesn't want to scan a document, it's simultaneously shown on the screen the Microsoft Word Save As dialog with PDF selected as the file type.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

The narrator says: 'I’m going to use the Prepare Form option; I don’t want to scan a document; I’ll use this form.' (00:08:32.676-00:09:08.741) Therefore, the correct answer is C: I’m going to use the Prepare Form option; I don’t want to scan a document; I’ll use this form.
